dataList.desc: 소지 제자 3스킬 첫 사용 턴 시작시
dataList.dlg: This blade of mine may not rival the original style, yet its form is impeccably mimicked—permit me to demonstrate.
My humble self has served its part. I shall now retreat.
Sorry I'm late. Fascia's a sleepyhead.
I'll have to put this ingredient to use.
These blood vessels are sufficiently thick. Not bad at all.
She's still incomplete.
My bones as the frame, my flesh as the stuffing—the art of the exterior.
Non è bello. This doesn't cut it.

dataList.desc: 약지 제자 약화버전 131905 공격 종료 후 턴시작시 흐트러짐
dataList.dlg: This won't do. It's an insult to the audience to stand before them in such crude form.
Wait... No touching Fascia. She's for display only.
Witness a demonstration of the Palermitan dismantling technique. Sezionatura di Cervo!
Demonstration complete.
Observe the angle, speed, and the precise arc with which I swing the sword. Let it jog your memories.

dataList.desc: 엄지 제자 130604 스킬 합 패배 시
dataList.dlg: Apologies... I am yet incomplete.

dataList.desc: 엄지 제자 타겟 지정 패턴 발동 시
dataList.dlg: In one-on-one duels, my Palermitan Style has the advantage.

dataList.desc: 엄지 제자 타겟 지정 패턴 발동 시
dataList.dlg: Slowly but surely, one-by-one.

dataList.desc: 엄지 제자 타겟 지정 패턴 - 겨뤄본 칼날 버프가 가징 많이 쌓인 상대에게 합 승리 시
dataList.dlg: Excellent technique, but it's become all too predictable.
... These borrowed tools have proved their unexpected yet welcome usefulness.
Incorrect. Observe my demonstration of the form, and try again.
Excellent. But your form needs some additional correction...
